author: rwatler
msg: - add defaults object and API used by Page to Folder PSML and Page Manager schema, (includes skin and decorator defaults)
- add getEffectiveDefaultDecorator() API Page and Folder to access defaults set in parent folders
- add skin attribute to Link PSML and Page Manager schema as was added to Folder
- default menu option skin setting from PSML settings in Page, Folder, and Link
- update PSML documentation, dtds, and XML schema for above modifications
